text:
="preserve">Grand Theft Auto III is a 2001 open world video game that is the third main entry of the Grand Theft Auto franchise.
Development.
Due to the September 11 attacks, the police cars have been redesigned from their NYPD look to a more generic look and a mission involving hijacking a plane has been removed.
Reception.
Many people at the time considered the game groundbreaking yet controversial at the same time.
